sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Telehealth Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Telehealth Act.

sections.heading: Definitions. As used in this Act:
sections.text: Definitions. As used in this Act:

sections.heading: Practice authority. A health care professional treating a patient located in this State through telehealth services must be licensed or authorized to practice in Illinois
